name: Daffodil Yellow: a few poems from an insect collector - DEMO SCENE
name_original: Daffodil Yellow: a few poems from an insect collector - DEMO SCENE
description:
An insect collector is looking for colors in old summer memories... 

In this small demo scene of “Daffodil Yellow: a few poems from an insect collector”, walk around the first scene and interact with the elements around you to maybe find a surprise. 

 

 

The story takes place at the very beginning of summer. This season makes the collector see everything in black and white. One day, after taking a nap, he turns into a butterfly… 

Since it didn't make sens to me to just have part of the abstract story in the demo, I decided to take one scene and make it possible for you to walk around in it to get a feeling of the general ambiance of the game/interactive experience with the wonderful music of Madli Marje Sink.

If you want to have the steam archievements in the demo, you can download it on steam also for free here . Via the link you can also add it to your wishlist, or follow the project here https://hdme.itch.io/daffodil-yellow-a-few-poems-from-an-insect-collector coming out in 2020

please let me know what you think of it :) 

-HD
